other_tests.findings: No focal liver lesions identified. No intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary dilatation. Gallbladder shows wall thickening and irregular mucosa with edema in adjacent periportal fat, small stones in gallbladder (up to 10 mm in diameter), mild soft tissue edema about pancreatic body and tail, borderline splenic size (12.9 cm), normal adrenals and kidneys, 15 mm filling defect in right extrarenal pelvis, small paraesophageal hiatal hernia, trace ascites about the liver.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Similar to prior recent CT findings.
